title: Drawing, "Detail de la base des mats places sur le pont-neuf en Juillet 1838", 1838
title_raw: "Detail de la base des mats places sur le pont-neuf en Juillet 1838"
medium:
Graphite
Support: tissue paper mounted on light tan paper
inscribed: Inscribed by a later hand in graphite on mount beneath image: Detail de la base des mats places sur le pont-neuf/en Juillet 1838.
description: Design for the lower portion of a polyhedron column that is decorated with arabesque designs.  Pegs extend out from the sides of the column at regular intervals.  The column rests on a tall, multi-part, graduated base, the uppermost portion consisting of a polyhedron platform with a simple, central band of palmettes.  Below is a large fluted, bell-shaped form with projecting cascading scrolls at the ribs, which in turn rests on a polyhedron plinth with rectangular marble insets.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Detail de la base des mats places sur le pont-neuf en Juillet 1838", 1838. Graphite
Support: tissue paper mounted on light tan paper. 
1991-17-16
